examples: She chatted for a few minutes about the qualities she considered desirable in a secretary.
Charló durante unos minutos sobre las cualidades que consideraba deseables en una secretaria.
Such measures are desirable, if not essential.
Tales medidas son deseables, si no esenciales.
The house has many desirable features.
La casa tiene muchas características deseables.
Experience of computers is highly desirable.
La experiencia de las computadoras es muy deseable.
